mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_sxoa_community (viId, viOrgId, viOrgName, viName,viAreaCode,viAddress,viCode,communityId,locationId,dtId) VALUES (#{viId}, #{viOrgId}, #{viOrgName}, #{viName},#{viAreaCode},#{viAddress},#{viCode},#{communityId},#{locationId},#{dtId})
mapper.select:
select t.* from s_sxoa_community t left join city_area ca on t.city_code = ca.area_code and ca.status_cd = '0' left join city_area ca1 on ca1.area_code = ca.parent_area_code and ca.status_cd = '0' where 1=1
and t.communityId = #{communityId}
